languages.text: "Если такова твоя природа — отдайся ей. В конце концов, что такого плохого в слепом разрушении?"
"If that is your nature, you should embrace it. Even blind destruction can serve a purpose, can't it?"
languages.original_text: "Если такова твоя природа — отдайся ей. В конце концов, что такого плохого в слепом разрушении?"

traits.locale_text: "If that is your nature, then you should embrace it. Even blind destruction can serve a purpose, can it not?"
"If that is your nature, then you should embrace it. Even blind destruction can serve a purpose, can it not?"
"If that is your nature, you should embrace it. Even blind destruction can serve a purpose, can't it?"
"If that is your nature, you should embrace it. Even blind destruction can serve a purpose, can't it?"
"If that is your nature, you should embrace it. Even blind destruction can serve a purpose, can't it?"
"If that is your nature, you should embrace it. Even blind destruction can serve a purpose, can't it?"

languages.text: « Si c'est là votre nature, vous devriez l'accepter. Même la destruction aveugle peut servir un objectif, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "If that is your nature, you should embrace it. Even blind destruction can serve a purpose, can't it?"

traits.locale_text: « Si c'est là votre nature, vous devriez l'accepter. Même la destruction aveugle peut servir un objectif, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: “如果这就是你的本性，那你应该接受它才对。即便是盲目的破坏，也可以用来实现特定的目的，不是吗？”
languages.original_text: "If that is your nature, you should embrace it. Even blind destruction can serve a purpose, can't it?"

traits.locale_text: “如果这就是你的本性，那你应该接受它才对。即便是盲目的破坏，也可以用来实现特定的目的，不是吗？”

languages.text: 「それがお前の本質なら、それを受け入れるべきだ。盲目的な破壊でも、目的を果たすことはできるだろう？」
languages.original_text: "If that is your nature, you should embrace it. Even blind destruction can serve a purpose, can't it?"

traits.locale_text: 「それがお前の本質なら、それを受け入れるべきだ。盲目的な破壊でも、目的を果たすことはできるだろう？」

languages.text: "Wenn das Euer Wesen ist, solltet Ihr es annehmen. Selbst blinde Zerstörung kann noch einem Zweck dienen, oder nicht?"
languages.original_text: "If that is your nature, you should embrace it. Even blind destruction can serve a purpose, can't it?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn das Euer Wesen ist, solltet Ihr es annehmen. Selbst blinde Zerstörung kann noch einem Zweck dienen, oder nicht?"

languages.text: «Si esa es tu naturaleza, deberías aceptarla. Incluso la destrucción ciega puede cumplir un propósito, ¿no es así?».
languages.original_text: "If that is your nature, you should embrace it. Even blind destruction can serve a purpose, can't it?"

traits.locale_text: «Si esa es tu naturaleza, deberías aceptarla. Incluso la destrucción ciega puede cumplir un propósito, ¿no es así?».

languages.text: "Madem doğanda bu var, o hâlde bunu benimsemelisin. Körü körüne yıkıma sebebiyet vermenin bile bir amaca hizmet etmesi mümkün değil midir?"
languages.original_text: "If that is your nature, you should embrace it. Even blind destruction can serve a purpose, can't it?"

traits.locale_text: "Madem doğanda bu var, o hâlde bunu benimsemelisin. Gözünü karartan bir yıkımın bile bir amaca hizmet etmesi mümkün değil mi?"
